title: iframe Hello
description: Hello message sent by a UI iframe to the Desktop Agent proxy setup by `getAgent()` to indicate it is ready to communicate and containing initial CSS to set on the iframe.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation Details
implementationDetails.description: Details about the UI implementation in the iframe, such as vendor and version, for logging purposes.

initialCSS.title: Initial CSS
initialCSS.description: A constrained set of CSS properties that should be set on the iframe before it is displayed.

height.title: height
height.description: The initial height of the iframe

width.title: width
width.description: The initial width of the iframe

position.title: position
position.description: The initial position CSS to apply to the iframe

zIndex.title: zIndex
zIndex.description: The initial zindex to apply to the iframe

left.title: left
left.description: The initial left property to apply to the iframe

top.title: top
top.description: The initial right property to apply to the iframe

transition.title: transition
transition.description: The transition property to apply to the iframe

maxHeight.title: maxHeight
maxHeight.description: The maximum height to apply to the iframe

maxWidth.title: maxWidth
maxWidth.description: The maximum with to apply to the iframe
